title: Properties of real and complex numbers

blocks.name: sqdivzi
blocks.content: Distribution of square over division. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Jun-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm sqdivzi(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, nat0), wceq(co(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cexp, nat2), co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cdiv, co(c0, cexp, nat2))))
  -| wcel(c1, cc)
  -| wcel(c0, cc)
} = {
  dedth(c0, nat1, wne(c0, nat0), wceq(co(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cexp, nat2), co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cdiv, co(c0, cexp, nat2))), wceq(co(co(c1, cdiv, cif(c0, nat1, wne(c0, nat0))), cexp, nat2), co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cdiv, co(cif(c0, nat1, wne(c0, nat0)), cexp, nat2))))
  eqeq12d(co(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cexp, nat2), co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cdiv, co(c0, cexp, nat2)), co(co(c1, cdiv, cif(c0, nat1, wne(c0, nat0))), cexp, nat2), co(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cdiv, co(cif(c0, nat1, wne(c0, nat0)), cexp, nat2)), wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wne(c0, nat0))))
  oveq1d(co(c1, cdiv, c0), cexp, nat2, co(c1, cdiv, cif(c0, nat1, wne(c0, nat0))), wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wne(c0, nat0))))
  oveq2(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wne(c0, nat0)), c1, cdiv)
  oveq2d(co(c1, cexp, nat2), cdiv, co(c0, cexp, nat2), co(cif(c0, nat1, wne(c0, nat0)), cexp, nat2), wceq(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wne(c0, nat0))))
  oveq1(c0, cif(c0, nat1, wne(c0, nat0)), cexp, nat2)
  sqdivi(c1, cif(c0, nat1, wne(c0, nat0)))
  ifcli(c0, nat1, cc, wne(c0, nat0))
  ax-1cn()
  elimne0(c0)
}

blocks.name: supfz
blocks.content: The supremum of a finite sequence of integers. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Aug-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm supfz(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wceq(csup(co(c1, cfz, c0), cz, clt), c0))
} = {
  supmax(hs0, co(c1, cfz, c0), cz, clt, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wor(clt, cz))
  mp2(wor(clt, cz), wss(cz, cr), wor(clt, cr))
  zssre()
  ltso()
  soss(cz, cr, clt)
  eluzelz(c0, c1)
  eluzfz2(c0, c1)
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfz, c0))), wn(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfz, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))
  elfzle2(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfz, c0)), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  zred(cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfz, c0)))
  elfzelz(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  eluzelre(c0, c1)
  lenlt(cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cfz, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)))
}

thm supfz(class c0, class c1) {

  ltso()
  soss(cz, cr, clt)

  eluzfz2(c0, c1)
  mpbid((c0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c1[...]c0)), ¬¨ c0[<]hs0, hs0[‚â§]c0)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` c1), hs0 ‚àà(c1[...]c0), hs0[‚â§]c0)
  elfzle2(hs0, c1, c0)

blocks.name: inffz
blocks.content: The infimum of a finite sequence of integers. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Aug-2013.) (Revised by AV, 10-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm inffz(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wceq(cinf(co(c1, cfz, c0), cz, clt), c1))
} = {
  infmin(hs0, co(c1, cfz, c0), cz, clt, c1, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wor(clt, cz))
  mp2(wor(clt, cz), wss(cz, cr), wor(clt, cr))
  zssre()
  ltso()
  soss(cz, cr, clt)
  eluzfz1(c0, c1)
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfz, c0))), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfz, c0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)))
  elfzle1(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfz, c0)), wb(wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs0)), wn(wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1))), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  zred(c1, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)))
  eluzel2(c0, c1)
  zred(cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfz, c0)))
  elfzelz(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  lenlt(c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c1, cfz, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)))
}

blocks.name: fz0n
blocks.content: The sequence ` ( 0 ... ( N - 1 ) ) ` is empty iff ` N ` is zero. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-May-2014.)

thm fz0n(class c0) {

  0z()
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  nn0z(c0)
  peano2zm(c0)
  fzn(nat0, co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cn0), wb(wbr(co(c0, cmin, nat1), clt, nat0), wceq(c0, nat0)), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  elnn0(c0)
  jaoi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0), wb(wbr(co(c0, cmin, nat1), clt, nat0), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  2falsed(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(co(c0, cmin, nat1), clt, nat0), wceq(c0, nat0))
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cn), wn(wbr(co(c0, cmin, nat1), clt, nat0)), wbr(nat1, cle, c0))
  nnge1(c0)
  sylancl(wcel(c0, cn), wb(wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wn(wbr(co(c0, cmin, nat1), clt, nat0))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(nat1, cr))
  nnre(c0)
  1re()
  bitr3d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(nat1, cr)), wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wn(wbr(co(c0, cmin, nat1), clt, nat0)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cmin, nat1)))

blocks.name: shftvalg
blocks.content: Value of a sequence shifted by ` A ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm shftvalg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cshi, c2), c3), cfv(c0, co(c3, cmin, c2))))
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cshi, c2), c3), cfv(c0, co(c3, cmin, c2))))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wi(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cshi, c2), c3), cfv(c0, co(c3, cmin, c2)))), wi(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wceq(cfv(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c2), c3), cfv(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmin, c2)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wceq(cfv(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c2), c3), cfv(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmin, c2))), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cshi, c2), c3), cfv(c0, co(c3, cmin, c2))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c2), c3), cfv(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmin, c2)), cfv(co(c0, cshi, c2), c3), cfv(c0, co(c3, cmin, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1d(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c2), c3, co(c0, cshi, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, cshi, c2)
  fveq1(cv(hs0), c0, co(c3, cmin, c2))
  shftval(c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc)), wceq(cfv(co(c0, cshi, c2), c3), cfv(c0, co(c3, cmin, c2)))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm shftvalg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)‚Üí((c0[shift]c2)` c3)=(c0 `(c3[-]c2)))
} = {
  3impib(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, c3 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, ((c0[shift]c2)` c3)=(c0 `(c3[-]c2)))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, ((c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)‚Üí((c0[shift]c2)` c3)=(c0 `(c3[-]c2))), ((c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)‚Üí((hs0[shift]c2)` c3)=(hs0 `(c3[-]c2))))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c0, (c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ), ((hs0[shift]c2)` c3)=(hs0 `(c3[-]c2)), ((c0[shift]c2)` c3)=(c0 `(c3[-]c2)))
  eqeq12d(((hs0[shift]c2)` c3), (hs0 `(c3[-]c2)), ((c0[shift]c2)` c3), (c0 `(c3[-]c2)), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1d((hs0[shift]c2), c3, (c0[shift]c2), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, cshi, c2)
  fveq1(hs0, c0, (c3[-]c2))
  shftval(c2, c3, hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(((c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)‚Üí((c0[shift]c2)` c3)=(c0 `(c3[-]c2))))
}

blocks.name: divcnvlin
blocks.content: Limit of the ratio of two linear functions. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 17-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm divcnvlin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, nat1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, cli, nat1), wbr(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c3, cmin, c4)), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cli, nat1))
  sylib(w0, wbr(cmpt(hs0, cz, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c3, cmin, c4)), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cli, nat1), wbr(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c3, cmin, c4)), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cli, co(nat1, caddc, nat0)))
  eqbrtrd(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c3, cmin, c4)), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cli, co(nat1, caddc, nat0), cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat1, caddc, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(hs0, cn, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c3, cmin, c4)), cdiv, cv(hs0)), co(nat1, caddc, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(hs0))), w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(c3, cmin, c4)), cdiv, cv(hs0)), co(nat1, caddc, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(hs0))), co(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  divdird(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmin, c4), cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  oveq1d(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs0)), caddc, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(hs0)), nat1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  dividd(cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  climaddc2(s0, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat1, caddc, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(hs0)))), nat1, nat0, cn, nat1, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(hs0))), universe, w0)
  1zzd(w0)
  syl(w0, wbr(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cli, nat0), wcel(co(c3, cmin, c4), cc))
  divcnv(hs0, co(c3, cmin, c4))
  1cnd(w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat1, caddc, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(hs0)))), universe))
  mptex(hs0, cn, co(nat1, caddc, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(hs0))))
  nnex()
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), cn, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cc, w0)
  fmpttd(hs0, cn, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(hs0)), cc, w0)
  divcld(co(c3, cmin, c4), cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(co(c3, cmin, c4), cc))
  subcld(c3, c4, w0)

  eqtr4d(cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat1, caddc, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0)), co(nat1, caddc, cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(hs0))), cv(s0))), co(nat1, caddc, co(co(c3, cmin, c4), cdiv, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cn))

  mptex(hs0, c2, cneg(cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))
  fvexi(c2, cuz, c3)
  recnd(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  syl6eq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c2, cneg(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0)), co(nat0, cmin, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), cneg(cfv(c4, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))

  eqid((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ -u((c4 ` hs0))))

blocks.name: bccolsum
blocks.content: A column-sum rule for binomial coefficents. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 24-Jun-2020.)
